attributes.additional_details: Water companies should be not for profit. The water companies are failing in their duty of care to the environment and yet taking profits, giving bonuses and pleading for funding from the government when they get into financial trouble.
attributes.background: Nationalise the water industry. Water is a basic human right.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727463
